thread.title: Life | Watch: So robots are way too advanced and we're scared
thread.title_full: Life | Watch: So robots are way too advanced and we're scared - entertainment.ie

author: Jason Brennan
title: Life | Watch: So robots are way too advanced and we're scared
text:
Somebody tell us when this happened?
We want our robots to be malfunctioning, bumbling, clunky idiots. We don't need them having conversations with us, and we especially don't need them to have better annunciation than us!
We've seen Ex Machina, we know what happens *Spoilers*
Nah, no spoilers, we just thought it'd be fun. Anyway, have a look at Coco, the soon to be end of humanity as we know it.
MORE: Watch: This robot being bullied by children broke our hearts
MORE: There's a Tinder robot that automatically chooses the people you find attractive
MORE: The prizes for these new Irish Instagram awards will have everyone glued to their phones
